ComicInfo.Summary: "CITY OF THE DEAD" Genevieve becomes more deeply entangled in the dangerous game she's playing with Julien and the Duke of Lorraine. Julien descends into the blackest depths of the catacombs beneath Paris for a horrific confrontation. And at last, the true identity of the Holy Grail is revealed.
ComicInfo.Title: City of the Dead
